by the way, among his apostles,"},{"lineNumber":71182,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ブラットとピットがいるわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"  there are Bratt and Hannies!"},{"lineNumber":71184,"originalJapaneseLine":"　霊体が故に物理攻撃が効きにくく、","translatedEnglishLine":"  Because they are spiritual bodies, physical attacks hardly work,"},{"lineNumber":71185,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハニーが故に魔法攻撃は無効！」","translatedEnglishLine":"  and because they are Hanny types, magic attacks are ineffective!\""},{"lineNumber":71186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、なんとも厄介そう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, they sound really troublesome!\""},{"lineNumber":71187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、姿が見えないのよね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But you can't even see their form...\""},{"lineNumber":71188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":71189,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ますぞえ様だし、そんなものかもね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, it's Masuzoe-san, so maybe that's just how it is.\""},{"lineNumber":71190,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーっ、素敵ー！　カミーラ様ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa~! Wonderful! Lady Camilla!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その上、なんと、アレフガルドさんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And moreover, Alefgard-san is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お腹がとっても、もっふもふ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: very fluffy on the belly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまり！　メディウサ様は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In other words! Lady Medusa

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドさんにお世話され放題！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gets to be pampered by Alefgard as much as she wants!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっふもふし放題！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She can fluff and cuddle to her heart's content!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「羨ましいったらないわね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's just so enviable!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メディウサ様のおそばに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As long as Alefgard-san is by Lady Medusa's side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドさんがいる限り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it won't be easy to take her on—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻略は容易じゃないでしょうねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the strategy won't be easy, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなメディウサ様のご趣味は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And Lady Medusa's hobby is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子いじめ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: bullying girls."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様みたいに、シィルちゃんさんを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unlike Lord Rance, who might lightly tap Shiru-chan's head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えいっぽかぽかって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like a playful smack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭叩いたりするんじゃないのよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa doesn't do that, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あそこにへびの頭突っ込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She sticks a snake's head in there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お腹の中の内臓むしゃむしゃしたりするの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and munches on the internal organs inside the belly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んで、女の子がぎゃあああって上げる悲鳴聞いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, when the girl screams 'Gyaaaa!',

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けらけら笑ったりするような超サディストさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she giggles—she's a total sadist like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こわっ、すごっ、えぐっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Scary, amazing, brutal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも個人的に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But personally,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、メディウサ様が相手ならいいかなって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it might be okay if Lady Medusa is the one dealing with me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、そんなこと言い出す子は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But kids who say stuff like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサ様的には微妙そうよねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are probably a bit iffy from Lady Medusa's point of view."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「謎魔人！　ますぞえ様のお話よー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A mysterious demon! This is about Lord Masuzoe!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「画像にもあるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As seen in the picture,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正式名称は『ますぞゑ』ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the official name is 'Masuzoe.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもみんな『ますぞえ』って呼ぶわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But everyone calls him 'Masuzoe.'"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わかりやすさ優先で私もそう呼ぶわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For simplicity, I call him that too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、ますぞえ様はハニーの魔人よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, Lord Masuzoe is a Hanny-type demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「元種族が謎だらけなもんだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because his original species is full of mysteries,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえ様もそれに輪をかけた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masuzoe-san is even more of an enigma.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく分からない存在よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is a very hard to understand existence."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、どうやって生まれた魔人なのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First of all, how he was born as a demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそもいつからいるのかも分かっていないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even since when he has existed—none of that is known."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、何よりも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And above all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何を考えているのかよく分からないのよね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's hard to understand what he's thinking..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お顔を見ると結構怒ってるっぽいんだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Looking at his face, he seems pretty angry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子の一緒の時は喜んで……る？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but when he's with Haniko, is he happy...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな感じの方なので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of that kind of nature,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王や魔人の中でも浮いてるというか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he kind of stands out among the Demon Lords and demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえ様と仲良くしようって方はいないみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it seems no one wants to be friends with Masuzoe-san."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一応使えるなら使おうってなもんで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If they can use him, they'll try to,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス派もホーネット派も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both the Kaybliss faction and the Hornet faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お声だけはかけたそうなんだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have apparently reached out to him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たった一言も喋らなかったとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "but he didn't utter a single word."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そもそも喋れるのかしらね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder if he can even speak to begin with..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハニ子が通訳代わりに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haniko acts as his interpreter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こう言ってるって教えてくれるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: telling us what he supposedly says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子の妄想の可能性もあるわよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it could also be Haniko's imagination."
"Hmmm..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、ちなみに使徒に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, by the way, among his apostles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブラットとピットがいるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are Bratt and Pitt."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとこの二体、ゴーストハニー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "These two are Ghost Hannies!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 霊体が故に物理攻撃が効きにくく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because they are spiritual bodies, physical attacks hardly work,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーが故に魔法攻撃は無効！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and because they are Hanny types, magic attacks are ineffective!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、なんとも厄介そう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, they sound really troublesome!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、姿が見えないのよね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you can't even see their form..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ますぞえ様だし、そんなものかもね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's Masuzoe-san, so maybe that's just how it is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーっ、素敵ー！　カミーラ様ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa~! Wonderful! Lady Camilla!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Hannies!"},{"lineNumber":71184,"originalJapaneseLine":"　霊体が故に物理攻撃が効きにくく、","translatedEnglishLine":"  Because they are spiritual bodies, physical attacks hardly work,"},{"lineNumber":71185,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハニーが故に魔法攻撃は無効！」","translatedEnglishLine":"  and because they are Hanny types, magic attacks are ineffective!\""},{"lineNumber":71186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、なんとも厄介そう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, they sound really troublesome!\""},{"lineNumber":71187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、姿が見えないのよね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But you can't even see their form...\""},{"lineNumber":71188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":71189,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ますぞえ様だし、そんなものかもね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, it's Masuzoe-san, so maybe that's just how it is.\""},{"lineNumber":71190,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーっ、素敵ー！　カミーラ様ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa~! Wonderful! Lady Camilla!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その上、なんと、アレフガルドさんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And moreover, Alefgard-san is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お腹がとっても、もっふもふ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: very fluffy on the belly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまり！　メディウサ様は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In other words! Lady Medusa

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドさんにお世話され放題！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gets to be pampered by Alefgard as much as she wants!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっふもふし放題！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She can fluff and cuddle to her heart's content!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「羨ましいったらないわね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's just so enviable!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メディウサ様のおそばに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As long as Alefgard-san is by Lady Medusa's side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレフガルドさんがいる限り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it won't be easy to take her on—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻略は容易じゃないでしょうねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the strategy won't be easy, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなメディウサ様のご趣味は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And Lady Medusa's hobby is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子いじめ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: bullying girls."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様みたいに、シィルちゃんさんを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unlike Lord Rance, who might lightly tap Shiru-chan's head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えいっぽかぽかって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like a playful smack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭叩いたりするんじゃないのよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa doesn't do that, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あそこにへびの頭突っ込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She sticks a snake's head in there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お腹の中の内臓むしゃむしゃしたりするの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and munches on the internal organs inside the belly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んで、女の子がぎゃあああって上げる悲鳴聞いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, when the girl screams 'Gyaaaa!',

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けらけら笑ったりするような超サディストさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she giggles—she's a total sadist like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こわっ、すごっ、えぐっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Scary, amazing, brutal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも個人的に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But personally,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、メディウサ様が相手ならいいかなって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it might be okay if Lady Medusa is the one dealing with me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、そんなこと言い出す子は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But kids who say stuff like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサ様的には微妙そうよねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are probably a bit iffy from Lady Medusa's point of view."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「謎魔人！　ますぞえ様のお話よー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A mysterious demon! This is about Lord Masuzoe!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「画像にもあるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As seen in the picture,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正式名称は『ますぞゑ』ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the official name is 'Masuzoe.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもみんな『ますぞえ』って呼ぶわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But everyone calls him 'Masuzoe.'"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わかりやすさ優先で私もそう呼ぶわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For simplicity, I call him that too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、ますぞえ様はハニーの魔人よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, Lord Masuzoe is a Hanny-type demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「元種族が謎だらけなもんだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because his original species is full of mysteries,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえ様もそれに輪をかけた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masuzoe-san is even more of an enigma.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく分からない存在よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is a very hard to understand existence."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、どうやって生まれた魔人なのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First of all, how he was born as a demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそもいつからいるのかも分かっていないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even since when he has existed—none of that is known."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、何よりも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And above all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何を考えているのかよく分からないのよね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's hard to understand what he's thinking..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お顔を見ると結構怒ってるっぽいんだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Looking at his face, he seems pretty angry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子の一緒の時は喜んで……る？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but when he's with Haniko, is he happy...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな感じの方なので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of that kind of nature,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王や魔人の中でも浮いてるというか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he kind of stands out among the Demon Lords and demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ますぞえ様と仲良くしようって方はいないみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it seems no one wants to be friends with Masuzoe-san."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一応使えるなら使おうってなもんで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If they can use him, they'll try to,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス派もホーネット派も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both the Kaybliss faction and the Hornet faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お声だけはかけたそうなんだけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have apparently reached out to him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たった一言も喋らなかったとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "but he didn't utter a single word."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そもそも喋れるのかしらね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder if he can even speak to begin with..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハニ子が通訳代わりに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haniko acts as his interpreter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こう言ってるって教えてくれるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: telling us what he supposedly says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニ子の妄想の可能性もあるわよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it could also be Haniko's imagination."
"Hmmm..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、ちなみに使徒に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, by the way, among his apostles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ブラットとピットがいるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are Bratt and Pitt."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとこの二体、ゴーストハニー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "These two are Ghost Hannies!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 霊体が故に物理攻撃が効きにくく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because they are spiritual bodies, physical attacks hardly work,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーが故に魔法攻撃は無効！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and because they are Hanny types, magic attacks are ineffective!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、なんとも厄介そう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, they sound really troublesome!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、姿が見えないのよね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you can't even see their form..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ますぞえ様だし、そんなものかもね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's Masuzoe-san, so maybe that's just how it is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーっ、素敵ー！　カミーラ様ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa~! Wonderful! Lady Camilla!"
